DOC.brief_title: Sleep Disturbance Sleep Quality Women With Fibromyalgia Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: At least 50 woman 18 year age invite volunteer study . Sleep quality problem sleep describe use several kind measure . Questionnaires sleep Fibromyalgia complete volunteer . In addition , volunteer complete sleep diary least 7 day wear Actiwatch ( wrist watch like device measure sleep ) . At completion study , participant provide print sleep obtain Actiwatch . Participants may study work night shift ( 11 pm - 7 ) diagnose condition call sleep apnea . Participants need live Kentucky participate study .
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year old ; diagnose Fibromyalgia ; Volunteer work night shift ( 11PM 7AM ) ; Volunteer diagnose sleep apnea .
